text: Stefan Studer (born January 30, 1964 in Buxtehude) is a German footballer who played as a defender or midfielder. ==References== ==External links== * Stefan Studer at eintracht-archiv.de Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Association football midfielders Category:German footballers Category:Bundesliga players Category:Hamburger SV players Category:FC St. Pauli players Category:Eintracht Frankfurt players Category:SG Wattenscheid 09 players Category:Hannover 96 players Category:FC Hansa Rostock players Category:1. title: Stefan Studer
